scripts.start-mysql: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const mysql = spawn('cmd', ['/c', 'cd', process.env.XAMPP_PATH, '&&', 'xampp_start.exe', '/start', 'MySQL'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); mysql.on('close', (code) => { console.log('MySQL process exited with code:', code); });"
scripts.start-api: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const api = spawn('node', ['index'], { cwd: process.env.API_PATH, stdio: 'inherit' }); api.on('close', (code) => { console.log('API process exited with code:', code); });"
scripts.stop-api: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); exec('netstat -ano | findstr :5000', (err, stdout) => { if (err) { console.error('Error fetching process list:', err); return; } const lines = stdout.trim().split('\n'); if (lines.length === 0) { console.log('No API process found on port 5000.'); return; } const pid = lines[0].split(/[ ]+/).pop(); exec('taskkill /PID ' + pid + ' /F', (killErr) => { if (killErr) { console.error('Error stopping API:', killErr); return; } console.log('API stopped.'); }); });"
scripts.restart-api: npm run stop-api && npm run start-api
scripts.start-vite: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); exec('vite', (err, stdout, stderr) => { console.log(stdout); console.error(stderr); });"
scripts.open-browser: node -r dotenv/config -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); spawn(process.env.BROWSER_PATH, ['http://localhost:' + process.env.VITE_PORT], { detached: true, stdio: 'ignore' });"
